Package teal.plot.ptolemy

Provides classes for rendering graphs based on the Ptolemy II system, Copyright (c) 1995-2002 The Regents of the University of California.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CloseListener
    This is an interface for listeners that need to be informed when a window closes.
    QueryListener
    Listener interface for changes in the query box.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentDialog
    This class is a modal dialog box that contains an arbitrary component.
    EPSGraphics
    Graphics class supporting EPS export from plots.
    Plot
    A flexible signal plotter.
    PlotBox
    This class provides a labeled box within which to place a data plot.
    PlotDataException
    Exception thrown by plot classes if there are format problems with the data to be plotted.
    PlotFormatter
    PlotFormatter is a panel that controls the format of a plotter object passed to the constructor.
    PlotPoint
    A simple structure for storing a plot point.
    Query
    Create a query with various types of entry boxes and controls.

Package teal.plot.ptolemy Description

Provides classes for rendering graphs based on the Ptolemy II system, Copyright (c) 1995-2002 The Regents of the University of California. The original software has been modified to make the plots TElements and the classes selected are limited to ones that are used by the TEALsim project.

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
